text: @MSNBC It's no surprise for Trump to blame everyone except himself! He refuses to take full responsibility for his failures & incompetence in dealing with the Coronavirus pandemic crisis that has resulted to 7,158 deaths & growing exponentially! There is American blood in his hands!
